topic: How to design web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to design web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Designing Web Backends Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides an overview of how to develop efficient and modern web backends using FastAPI, a powerful and user-friendly framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: FastAPI is built on top of Starlette and provides automatic generation of OpenAPI documentation.
It supports asynchronous operations out of the box, making it ideal for scalable web applications.
FastAPI offers intuitive routing, powerful validation, and useful features like type hints and exception handling for increased developer productivity.
Integration with popular databases (SQLAlchemy, Databases.SQLite, etc.) and authentication methods (JWT, OAuth2) is straightforward.
version_notes: FastAPI v0.71.0 is compatible with Python 3.12+
For best results, ensure your project environment utilizes this version or higher.
caveats: Be aware of dependencies and their compatibility with the target Python version.
